Blog.post: The fishtank works!! We have two fish and some gross-looking lobster thing in there... I hope they dont die... anyway im goin to the lake tomorrow, so see ya sunday when i get back!

Jack and I went to Wally-Mart and finally got a Dickie's jumpsuit my name is Freek-A-Leek. Jack, of course is Jack-Pot And Ryan is the only one yet to make his. He needs a name. Me and Jack keep sayin' Bulbous Head...cause thats his name, but he is embarrassed. If anyone has an idea...tell me. Ryan needs major help...he has mental problems. We also caught some fish at Jack's pond. The fish tank we are making finally got a bottom. As soon as the caulk dries it will be ready for use. All those fish we caught need a home...

Today, I went over to Jack's house. He has a pond behind his house. The problem is, the huge, mean turtles that live there were eating all the fish. So we had to catch some turtles. First, we spent half an hour trying to catch a fish to use as bait for the turtles. After we finally got one, we cut it up and baited the line. Not long after, one of the lines got tight. We pulled the turtle in only to find out that it was "engaging" another turtle of opposite gender... We tried to get both, but the other swam away. I named the one we caught Bill Clinton. Bill Clinton almost bit off my thumb. Oh! We are also in the middle of making a fish tank... again cause were bored. I'll let ya know how it turns out. All-in-all...it was an eventful day.

OK, I just created this blog...cause I'm board... I've decided that not enough people know what goes on day by day in my life. Also, doing this might help me remember what I did last week, or yesterday, or 5 minutes ago... wait, what was I doing?

Well, this first week of school is almost over and today is frisbee at pinkerton... First game is tomorrow...DICKIES!!! ohh yeah! So were gonna tailgate and swim in the truck/pool. Its gonna be awesome. Were doin a test on the pool today....hope it all works... OhYeah!!! the pool works....we tested it and its awesome. cant wait for tomorrow!!!

First day of school toady!!!! It was ok...We got out at 11 and Me, Jack, Nick, Bulbous Head, Nicole, Lissa, Maria, Karli, and Joanna went to get mexican food. After that we went and got stuff for bulbous head's dickies, and we saw these awesome pink shirts and we decided to make something out of them...and its awesome. I can't even describe how awesome they are... im puttin a picture up. We're wearing them tomorrow ohh, we went to the girl's soccer game and there was this girl on the other team with "Stubblefield" on the back of her jersey. We kept yelling at her and finally Jack bet that i wouldnt give her my number...i did. And she just totally called me, like 5 mins ago. She thinks i'm smokin... her number is 931-518-5368 Call her and harrass her for her stupid name.

Dave was awesome!! I took a picture with my phone.... I'm gonna get it on here as soon as I can. Im goin to Jack's lake house tomorrow with Jack, Charles, Bulbous Head, and Trey...be back in a few days.

We went to school today to register...my schedule isnt bad... I found out who rolled me! It was Nicole, Lissa, and Maria!!! I'm gonna get them back sooo bad Dave Matthews Band concert tomorrow! It's gonna be awesome...
I pretty much just chilled today...Tomorrow I gotta go to school to register and stuff. Yup

I got rolled on friday night and i am pretty sure it was Steven Lawrance...Jack, Ryan and i are gonna get him back soo bad. The lake was awesome, perfect weather both days... my tan status: mexican that hasn't been outside in a year
